enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: 'GOOD PRACTICES' IN POLICIES AND MEASURES IN ANNEX I PARTIES
sentences: Tony Surridge (South Africa) reported on the informal consultations and introduced the draft conclusions, noting that Parties had been unable to reach agreement.
SOUTH AFRICA, with several Parties, and opposed by SAUDI ARABIA, KUWAIT and UNITED ARAB EMIRATES, expressed support for the text.
Noting no agreement, Parties decided to forward this item to SBSTA-22 (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.25).
